title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Analyzing and Applying the Effects of Emotional Design in Multimedia Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Knowledge of Social Studies Curriculum at the Secondary Education Level
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners understand principles of emotional design (color, form, anthropomorphism, etc.) and can apply them to actual educational materials
Learners can analyze the impact of positive design on knowledge transfer in multimedia learning environments with 80% or higher accuracy
Learners can select and evaluate appropriate emotional design strategies based on prior knowledge levels (high/low)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
